tvdb: Frank explains how he became The Avatar after Karen saves his life.  Livvie asks Alison to back away from Rafe because of the baby but Alison says Rafe must make his own choices.  Kevin tells Rafe to leave Livvie if he doesn't really love her, but Rafe is determined to stick to his promise to Livvie, then tells Livvie he loves her.  Kevin orders copies of Livvie's medical records.  Karen takes Frank home where she admits her love for him and he claims he's a changed man, but then vows revenge on Ian and Rafe.  Ricky, who was stood up by Karen, shows up at her doorstep just as Frank and Karen are about to make love.
